import React , {useState, UseEffect} from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Row, Col, FormGroup, FormLabel, FormControl} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' const LoginScreen = ({ props }) => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const { search } = useLocation(); const redirect = search ? search.split('=')[1] : "/"; const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() //Dispatch Login } return

Sign In

Email Address setEmail(e.target.value)} > Password setPassword(e.target.value)} >
New Customer? Register } export default LoginScreen
